title: EnvSSLAM-FFN: Lightweight Layer-Fused System for ESDD 2026 Challenge
summary: Recent advances in generative audio models have enabled high-fidelity environmental sound synthesis, raising serious concerns for audio security. The ESDD 2026 Challenge therefore addresses environmental sound deepfake detection under unseen generators (Track 1) and black-box low-resource detection (Track 2) conditions.
